original_text:
I would give him an account of all my steps;
    like a prince I would approach him.
korean_text: 내 걸음의 수효를 그에게 알리고 왕족처럼 그를 가까이 하였으리라

sentences.original_text: I would give him an account of all my steps
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 모든 걸음을 그에게 보고하겠다.

sentences.original_text: like a prince I would approach him.
